If you have the codeword Discover, .
If not, but you have the codeword Double, .
If you have neither codeword, read on.

The high priestess is covered from head to toe in bright white silks - all you can see are her eyes, like twin orbs of amber. She tells you that the mirror of the Sun Goddess, a holy relic of the temple, has been stolen. She believes it has fallen into the hands of a steppe nomad, one of the Horde of the Thundering Skies, and asks that you retrieve it for them. In return, the temple will reward you.
‘Only a priest is worthy enough to handle the mirror,’ she adds.
If you want to take up the mission, record the codeword Double.
